definition: small nut of either of two small chestnut trees of the southern United States
details:
noun
- small nut of either of two small chestnut trees of the southern United States
= synonyms: chincapin
- shrubby chestnut tree of southeastern United States having small edible nuts
= synonyms: eastern chinquapin
- shrubby tree closely related to the Allegheny chinkapin but with larger leaves
